document_title: Intestinal infections: Symptoms, causes and prevention
subsection_content:
Symptoms of intestinal infection will vary depending on the cause of the disease.(2)
Some of the signs that may be encountered include:
Stomach-ache.; Diarrhea.; Nausea.; Fever.; Chills.; Cramp.; Headache.; Blood appears in the stool.
